message: What are some strategies for getting your first client?
Get out there and live your life. You get the best referrals, especially early on, from friends of friends, family members, and just people you randomly bump into.

I got my first client via job-postings. Replying ot lots of postings on different boards/sites and eventually got a few to start with. Once you have a few projects finished you can put them on a portfolio and get work a little easier.
